org_midgardproject_projectsite_product.name: midcom
org_midgardproject_projectsite_product.title: MidCOM
org_midgardproject_projectsite_product.abstract: <b>Tightly coupled</b> PHP framework and CMS for <b>Midgard</b>
org_midgardproject_projectsite_product.content: <div><p>MidCOM is component framework for PHP running on top of the Midgard framework. MidCOM provides a full Content Management System based on a series of components. MidCOM users can build their websites by <i>"clicking together"</i> a directory hierarchy, each folder being managed by the appropriate component.</p></div><div><p>MidCOM components are distributed as PEAR packages that allows easy installation and maintenance of the environment.</p></div>
